grade1-dramatic-expression.name: Dramatic Expression & Role Play
grade1-dramatic-expression.description: Express emotions and characters through gesture, movement, facial expressions, and role-playing activities

grade1-letter-sounds.name: Letter-Sound Correspondence
grade1-letter-sounds.description: Match letters with their sounds, recognize initial sounds, and distinguish vowels from consonants

grade1-phonological-awareness.name: Phonological Awareness and Letter-Sound Correspondence
grade1-phonological-awareness.description: Recognizing sounds in words, identifying syllables, distinguishing vowels from consonants, and matching letters to their sounds

grade1-writing-letters.name: Writing Letters
grade1-writing-letters.description: Learn letter formation and handwriting basics including uppercase and lowercase letter recognition

grade1-writing-simple-words.name: Writing Simple Words
grade1-writing-simple-words.description: Write words by listening to sounds, spell phonetically regular words, and write common sight words

grade1-writing-composition.name: Writing Composition & Process
grade1-writing-composition.description: Learn to plan, draft, and revise simple texts including narratives, journal entries, and informational writing

grade1-listening-comprehension.name: Listening & Auditory Comprehension
grade1-listening-comprehension.description: Developing attentive listening skills, extracting essential information from spoken language, and demonstrating comprehension through appropriate responses

grade1-reading-fluency.name: Reading Fluency & Decoding
grade1-reading-fluency.description: Developing automatic word recognition through sight words, blending skills, letter combination mastery, and punctuation-guided reading

grade1-reading-short-sentences.name: Reading Short Sentences
grade1-reading-short-sentences.description: Reading and understanding simple sentences, matching sentences to pictures, and following written instructions

grade1-speaking-communication.name: Speaking and Communication
grade1-speaking-communication.description: Express experiences clearly, follow conversation rules, use polite communication, and respond appropriately in different situations

grade1-speaking-conversation.name: Speaking & Conversation Skills
grade1-speaking-conversation.description: Narrating experiences, following conversation rules, discussing learning processes, and giving constructive feedback

grade1-spelling.name: Spelling Strategies & Orthography
grade1-spelling.description: Applying phonological, syllabic, morphological, and grammatical principles to spell words correctly

grade1-reading-comprehension.name: Reading Comprehension Strategies
grade1-reading-comprehension.description: Apply pre-, during-, and post-reading strategies, make predictions, clarify unknown words, and answer comprehension questions

grade1-text-types.name: Text Types & Literary Engagement
grade1-text-types.description: Understanding different text types (poems, stories, informational texts), analyzing characters and story elements, and presenting texts

grade1-grammar.name: Grammar & Parts of Speech
grade1-grammar.description: Identify and use basic parts of speech including nouns, verbs, and adjectives, and understand simple word formation and sentence structure

grade1-handwriting.name: Handwriting & Writing Mechanics
grade1-handwriting.description: Developing clear, legible handwriting with proper letter formation, posture, and writing speed

grade1-language-awareness.name: Language Awareness & Multilingualism
grade1-language-awareness.description: Understanding communication purposes, recognizing dialects, comparing languages, and appreciating linguistic diversity

grade2-reading-simple-texts.name: Reading Simple Texts
grade2-reading-simple-texts.description: Decoding words, reading simple sentences and short texts with basic comprehension

grade2-compound-words.name: Compound Words
grade2-compound-words.description: Understanding and forming German compound words by combining two or more words to create new meanings

grade2-rhyming-words.name: Rhyming Words
grade2-rhyming-words.description: Identifying and producing rhyming words, understanding sound patterns in German

grade2-asking-questions.name: Asking Questions
grade2-asking-questions.description: Forming questions, using question words, and punctuating questions correctly

grade2-writing-simple-sentences.name: Writing Simple Sentences
grade2-writing-simple-sentences.description: Write complete sentences with capital letters at the beginning and periods at the end

grade2-alphabet-and-abc-order.name: Alphabet and ABC Order
grade2-alphabet-and-abc-order.description: Learning the German alphabet, alphabetical order, and using it for organizing and finding words

grade2-nouns-and-capital-letters.name: Nouns and Capital Letters
grade2-nouns-and-capital-letters.description: Recognizing nouns and writing them with capital letters

grade2-plural-forms.name: Plural Forms
grade2-plural-forms.description: Understanding and forming basic plural forms in German using patterns like -e, -en, -er, -s, and Umlaut changes

grade2-syllables-and-word-structure.name: Syllables and Word Structure
grade2-syllables-and-word-structure.description: Identifying syllables, clapping syllables, and understanding how words are built from syllable units

grade3-dialogue-roleplay.name: Dialogue and Role Play
grade3-dialogue-roleplay.description: Navigate communication situations routinely, follow conversation rules, provide feedback, and assume roles in dramatic play with character perspective

grade3-reading-strategies.name: Reading Comprehension Strategies
grade3-reading-strategies.description: Applying pre-, during-, and post-reading strategies to understand texts; activating prior knowledge; annotating; clarifying vocabulary; visualizing narrative elements

grade3-text-analysis.name: Text Analysis and Literary Understanding
grade3-text-analysis.description: Analyzing plot sequences, describing characters, explaining figurative language, and comparing different text types

grade3-reading-fluency.name: Reading Fluency and Expression
grade3-reading-fluency.description: Reading texts fluently with accuracy, appropriate pace, varied tempo and emphasis, while building extensive sight-word vocabulary

grade3-grammar-structures.name: Grammar and Sentence Structures
grade3-grammar-structures.description: Form complex words, apply verb tenses, identify parts of speech, punctuate direct speech, and combine sentences with conjunctions

grade3-composition-planning.name: Composition and Planning
grade3-composition-planning.description: Learn to plan and organize ideas for different types of writing using mind maps, word lists, and narrative structures

grade3-speaking-presentations.name: Speaking and Presentations
grade3-speaking-presentations.description: Construct logical contributions, use appropriate volume and pace, prepare presentations with notes, and apply standard and academic language

grade3-revision-feedback.name: Revision and Peer Feedback
grade3-revision-feedback.description: Give and receive constructive feedback, revise writing for clarity and correctness, and format texts appealingly

grade3-word-building.name: Word Building and Morphology
grade3-word-building.description: Understand stems, prefixes, suffixes; create word families; recognize compound nouns; explore vowel shifts in word families

grade3-listening-comprehension.name: Listening Comprehension and Academic Language
grade3-listening-comprehension.description: Extract key information from subject-specific academic language, demonstrate comprehension through summaries, and understand how vocal and gestural elements support meaning

grade3-spelling-principles.name: Spelling Principles and Strategies
grade3-spelling-principles.description: Apply phonological, syllabic, and morphological principles; master core vocabulary; use dictionaries; recognize orthographic patterns

grade3-writing-mechanics.name: Writing Mechanics and Handwriting
grade3-writing-mechanics.description: Produce legible handwriting; adjust script for purpose (print vs. cursive); maintain proper posture and grip

grade4-advanced-listening.name: Advanced Listening Comprehension
grade4-advanced-listening.description: Understanding complex spoken texts, asking targeted questions, recognizing comprehension gaps

grade4-parts-of-speech.name: Parts of Speech Mastery
grade4-parts-of-speech.description: Identify and use all major parts of speech with full awareness of nouns (case, gender), verbs (all tenses), articles, adjectives, and pronouns

grade4-discussion-skills.name: Discussion and Argumentation
grade4-discussion-skills.description: Lead discussions effectively, present and defend arguments with evidence, respond meaningfully to others' contributions, and resolve conflicts through collaborative dialogue

grade4-text-planning.name: Planning and Structuring Texts
grade4-text-planning.description: Learn to clarify purpose and audience, gather vocabulary and phrases, and organize ideas systematically before writing

grade4-spelling-strategies.name: Spelling Strategies and Rules
grade4-spelling-strategies.description: Apply derivation, sounding out, and memorization strategies; use reference tools effectively; master punctuation in direct speech

grade4-text-revision.name: Text Revision and Editing
grade4-text-revision.description: Self-correction, checking for clarity and effect, preparing for publication

grade4-text-types-genres.name: Text Types and Genres
grade4-text-types-genres.description: Recognizing and distinguishing fiction vs. non-fiction, narrative/poetic/dramatic forms, and developing media literacy

grade4-expressive-speaking.name: Expressive Speaking and Presentation
grade4-expressive-speaking.description: Adapting speech to context (narrating, informing, arguing), using standard German, presentation skills

grade4-literary-response.name: Literary Response and Interpretation
grade4-literary-response.description: Developing personal responses to literature, understanding character emotions and relationships, creating vivid mental images, and engaging creatively with texts through various forms

grade4-word-formation.name: Word Formation and Vocabulary
grade4-word-formation.description: Understanding word structure through stems, prefixes, suffixes, word families, semantic fields, and systematic vocabulary expansion

grade4-sentence-structure.name: Sentence Structure and Syntax
grade4-sentence-structure.description: Master sentence types, subject-predicate-complement structure, time references in sentences, complex sentence formation, and punctuation for different sentence types

grade5-informational-texts.name: Informational Text Comprehension
grade5-informational-texts.description: Comprehending non-fiction texts and non-linear information formats

grade5-narrative-writing.name: Narrative Writing
grade5-narrative-writing.description: Writing narratives with clear perspective and story structure (Einleitung, Hauptteil, Schluss)

grade5-poetry-analysis.name: Poetry Analysis
grade5-poetry-analysis.description: Understanding and appreciating poetic texts through form and expression

grade4-reading-comprehension.name: Advanced Reading Comprehension
grade4-reading-comprehension.description: Analyzing texts, finding central ideas, supporting claims with evidence, comparing texts

grade4-language-comparison.name: Language Awareness and Comparison
grade4-language-comparison.description: Comparing German with other languages, recognizing dialects and foreign words, distinguishing spoken and written language forms

grade4-dramatic-expression.name: Dramatic Expression and Role Play
grade4-dramatic-expression.description: Adopting perspectives, developing roles, exploring situations through play with advanced use of voice, gesture, and movement

grade5-discussion-skills.name: Discussion Skills and Classroom Dialogue
grade5-discussion-skills.description: Participating effectively in classroom discussions following established rules, responding appropriately to others, formulating and justifying opinions, and distinguishing conversation roles

grade5-media-literacy.name: Media Literacy
grade5-media-literacy.description: Understanding library systems, digital research, and reflecting on media use

grade5-oral-presentations.name: Oral Presentations
grade5-oral-presentations.description: Presenting information and experiences to classmates with clear structure and visual aids
